title: Timothée Chalamet and EsDeeKid Stop Rumors with a Fun Video
summary: Timothée Chalamet is a famous actor who people thought might be a secret rapper named EsDeeKid. EsDeeKid is a musician who wears a mask and only shows his eyes. Some fans noticed that their eyes looked similar, which started the rumors. To end the talk, Chalamet made a video with EsDeeKid. In the video, Chalamet raps with him and shows his face to prove he is not EsDeeKid. They filmed it at a store in London. The video became very popular online, with other rappers sharing it. This helped stop the silly idea that they are the same person.

background_read: Timothée Chalamet is a well-known actor from America who has been in many movies. EsDeeKid is a rapper from the UK who wears a mask and keeps his identity hidden, which makes people curious. Rumors can spread quickly on the internet when fans notice small details, like similar eyes. Making videos is a common way for celebrities to share messages and have fun with their fans. This story shows how celebrities use social media to talk directly to people and clear up misunderstandings in a creative way.
Article_Structure: WHO: Timothée Chalamet, a famous actor, and EsDeeKid, a masked rapper
WHAT: They made a video together to stop rumors that Chalamet is EsDeeKid
WHERE: Filmed at Andover Minimarket Off Licence in London
WHY: To prove they are different people and end the speculation

perspectives.description: This is a fun story about celebrities using music and videos to engage with fans and clear up gossip.
